title: The Art of War
author: Sunzi, active 6th century B.C.
content:
This audio reading of The Art of War is read by

Moira Fogarty




Contents

# 1 Laying Plans - 2 Waging War - 00:08:26

# 3 Attack By Stratagem - 4 Tactical Dispositions - 00:07:45

# 5 Energy - 6 Weak Points and Strong - 00:10:36

# 7 Maneuvering - 8 Variation in Tactics - 00:08:50

# 9 The Army on the March - 10 Terrain - 00:14:42

# 11 The Nine Situations - 00:12:56

# 12 The Attack By Fire - 13 The Use of Spies - 00:08:59

subjects: Military art and science -- Early works to 1800
